name: JoJo Banana Catch
description:
The evil gorilla BoBo has stolen all of the monkey JoJo's precious bananas! JoJo Banana Catch allows you to help JoJo throughout his thrilling quest to retrieve his stolen bananas from BoBo. JoJo must dodge falling boulders and bombs and collect falling bananas to increase his score! JoJo must travel through six unique levels spanning from the Great Banana Jungle to the middle of JoJo City! Each level offers a unique challenge or boss battle that you must help JoJo survive from so he can continue with his quest.

You can purchase unique skins and items to customize JoJo's appearance to whichever way you choose. JoJo Game Studios, LLC also donates 5% of the profits from every golden banana purchase to the World Wildlife Fund to help monkeys like JoJo in the real world!

Help JoJo get his bananas back!

PLEASE NOTE! JoJo Banana Catch is a free to download and play; however, some items and cosmetics in the game can be purchased with real money. If you would not like to use this feature, please disable in app purchases in your device settings.

A network connection is required to play JoJo Banana Catch.

FEATURES
- Collect falling bananas to increase JoJo's score
- Dodge deadly falling boulders and bombs to keep JoJo alive!
- Travel through 6 unique and different levels
- Battle with BoBo and other bosses and survive the boss battles!
- Purchase unique cosmetics to change JoJo's appearance
- Log on every day to collect your daily reward of golden bananas
- ¿Hable español? ¡Captura el Plátano de JoJo también se traduce al español!
- Use your JoJo Game Studios account to save your progress across multiple devices!
